nouns.description: albedo (countable and uncountable, plural albedos or albedoes)

entries.meaning: (physics, meteorology, astronomy, optics) The fraction of incident light or radiation reflected by a surface or body, commonly expressed as a percentage.
(botany) The whitish inner portion of the rind of citrus fruits that is a source of pectin, commonly referred to as the pith.
(alchemy) One of the four major stages of the magnum opus, involving purification of the prima materia.
